ComicInfo.Title: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein; The Origin of the Man-Thing; Gargoyle Every Night

ComicInfo.Summary: Robert Walton IV leads an expedition into the Artic to retrieve Frankenstein's Monster which has been frozen into the ice. He relates to the cabin boy how the monster was created.
